data.company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
data.description: This project aims to build a cloud-based platform for real-time data visualization, seamlessly integrating IoT devices and connecting various project management systems across the enterprise. The goal is to provide stakeholders with a comprehensive view of project progress, risks, and performance, enabling faster and more informed decision-making. The platform also fosters cross-departmental collaboration by creating a centralized space for information sharing and communication.

data.company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
data.description: Developed a cloud-based unified data platform integrating over 280 sources and 500+ data types to provide a comprehensive view of enterprise operations. The project accelerates analytics and enhances decision-making using Azure Data Factory, Synapse Analytics, and Databricks. Integrated a self-service portal (Data+) with intelligent search, AI chatbot, and knowledge graph to improve data accessibility and internal collaboration.

data.company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
data.description: A platform that helps enterprises optimize operations by connecting systems, analyzing data, and providing real-time improvement suggestions. Utilizes AI, interactive dashboards, and integrates with ERP systems to enhance performance and support faster decision-making.
